title: Episode 64: Beer For Beasts
description: Peter Aguero, who will be bringing his Jersey Fresh Burlesque to the Beer for Beasts Event, is Cathy Erway’s guest on this week’s episode of Let’s Eat In. Tune in to learn more about the misunderstood art of burlesque and how it will be incorporated in B4B. Beer for Beasts (B4B) will be held on Saturday, March 26, 2011, at The Bell House, located in Gowanus section (149 7th Street) of Park Slope in Brooklyn, NY, with all proceeds benefiting The Humane Society of New York City. This episode was sponsored by Whole Foods Market.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
